column4: How dangerous is it to try out Dapper? Do I help the developers if I do that (and report bugs etc.)?
yeah, you can help the developers by reporting bugs. You can encouter problems that in order fix them you have to rewrite part of the code and recompile it to get it work.
and if I can't really write code?
So you will be stuck with a system that can't boot, for example.
okay, but then I could always reinstall ubuntu...
If you have the time and patience, do it.
